entries.content: Starting task: Improve provider selection popup UI. Currently shows ugly format with first letter fallback. Need to integrate ProviderIconComponent system we built for proper icons and name underneath layout.

Successfully integrated ProviderIconComponent into ProviderSelectionPopup. Using 48px icons for better visibility. IDE shows hint about unused import but it's used in createProviderButton method - this is a false positive.

Updated CSS for provider selection popup. Removed old gradient background styles for text-based icons, replaced with proper img.provider-icon styling that works with ProviderIconComponent's image-based icons. Layout already perfect: icon on top (48px), name underneath, 2-column grid.
